00322 void GameInitMercs()
00323 {
00324 //    for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
00325 //          gubMercArray[ i ] = i+BIFF;
00326

00328       gubMercArray[ 0 ] = BIFF;
00329       gubMercArray[ 1 ] = HAYWIRE;
00330       gubMercArray[ 2 ] = GASKET;
00331       gubMercArray[ 3 ] = RAZOR;
00332       gubMercArray[ 4 ] = FLO;
00333       gubMercArray[ 5 ] = GUMPY;
00334       gubMercArray[ 6 ] = BUBBA;
00335       gubMercArray[ 7 ] = LARRY_NORMAL;         //if changing this values, change in GetMercIDFromMERCArray()
00336       gubMercArray[ 8 ] = LARRY_DRUNK;          //if changing this values, change in GetMercIDFromMERCArray()
00337       gubMercArray[ 9 ] = NUMB;
00338       gubMercArray[ 10 ] = TEX;
00339       gubMercArray[ 11 ] = BIGGENS;
00340       gubMercArray[ 12 ] = COUGAR;
00341       gubMercArray[ 13 ] = GASTON;
00342       gubMercArray[ 14 ] = STOGIE;
00343 
00344       LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_NO_ACCOUNT;
00345       gubCurMercIndex = 0;
00346 
00347       if(!gGameExternalOptions.fAllMercsAvailable)
00348       {
00349             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_OF_BAD_MERCS; // LAST_MERC_ID;
00350       }
00351       else
00352       {
00353             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex =  LAST_MERC_ID; //NUMBER_OF_BAD_MERCS;
00354       }
00355 
00356       gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_NO_VIDEO_MODE;
00357       gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed = FALSE;
00358 
00359       LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays = 0;
00360 
00361       gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = 0;
00362 
00363 /*
00364       for( i=0; i<MERC_NUMBER_OF_RANDOM_QUOTES; i++ )
00365       {
00366             gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[i] = 0;
00367       }
00368 */
00369 }

00371 
00372 BOOLEAN EnterMercs()
00373 {
00374   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00375       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00376 
00377       SetBookMark( MERC_BOOKMARK );
00378 
00379       //Reset a static variable
00380       HandleSpeckTalking( TRUE );
00381 
00382       InitMercBackGround();
00383 
00384       // load the Account box graphic and add it
00385       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00386       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AccountBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00387       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAccountBox));
00388 
00389       // load the files Box graphic and add it
00390       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00391       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\FilesBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00392       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFilesBox));
00393 
00394       // load the MercSymbol graphic and add it
00395       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00396       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\MERCSymbol.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00397       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMercSymbol));
00398 
00399       // load the SpecPortrait graphic and add it
00400       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00401       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\SpecPortrait.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00402       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSpecPortrait));
00403 
00404       // load the Arrow graphic and add it
00405       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00406       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Arrow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00407       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiArrow));
00408 
00409       // load the Merc video conf background graphic and add it
00410       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00411       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\SpeckComWindow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00412       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMercVideoPopupBackground));
00413 
00414 
00415       // Account Box button
00416       guiAccountBoxButtonImage  = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\SmallButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00417 
00418       guiAccountBoxButton = QuickCreateButton(guiAccountBoxButtonImage, MERC_ACCOUNT_BUTTON_X, MERC_ACCOUNT_BUTTON_Y,
00419                                                                                                 BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00420                                                                                                 DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAccountBoxButtonCallback);
00421       SetButtonCursor(guiAccountBoxButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00422       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiAccountBoxButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00423 
00424       guiFileBoxButton = QuickCreateButton(guiAccountBoxButtonImage, MERC_FILE_BUTTON_X, MERC_FILE_BUTTON_Y,
00425                                                                                                 BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00426                                                                                                 DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnFileBoxButtonCallback);
00427       SetButtonCursor(guiFileBoxButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00428       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiFileBoxButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00429 
00430       //if the player doesnt have an account disable it
00431       if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_NO_ACCOUNT )
00432       {
00433             DisableButton( guiFileBoxButton );
00434       }
00435 
00436 
00437       //
00438       //    Video Conferencing stuff
00439       //
00440 
00441       // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
00442       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00443       vs_desc.usWidth = MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH;
00444       vs_desc.usHeight = MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT;
00445       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00446       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiMercVideoFaceBackground) );
00447 
00448 
00449       RenderMercs();
00450 
00451       //init the face
00452 
00453       gfJustEnteredMercSite = TRUE;
00454 
00455       //if NOT entering from a subsite
00456       if( gubArrivedFromMercSubSite == MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE )
00457       {
00458             //Set that we have been here before
00459             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus == MERC_SITE_NEVER_VISITED )
00460                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus = MERC_SITE_FIRST_VISIT;
00461             else if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus == MERC_SITE_FIRST_VISIT )
00462                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus = MERC_SITE_SECOND_VISIT;
00463             else
00464                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus = MERC_SITE_THIRD_OR_MORE_VISITS;
00465 
00466             //Reset the speech variable
00467             gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
00468       }
00469 
00470 
00471       GetSpeckConditionalOpening( TRUE );
00472 //    gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE;
00473 
00474       //if Speck should start talking
00475       if( ShouldSpeckSayAQuote() )
00476       {
00477             gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_INIT_VIDEO_MODE;
00478       }
00479 
00480       //Reset the some variables
00481       HandleSpeckIdleConversation( TRUE );
00482 
00483       //Since we are in the site, set the flag
00484       gfInMercSite = TRUE;
00485 
00486       return(TRUE);
00487 }

00489 
00490 void ExitMercs()
00491 {
00492       StopSpeckFromTalking( );
00493 
00494       if( gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed )
00495       {
00496             gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed = FALSE;
00497             DeleteFace( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex  );
00498             InitDestroyXToCloseVideoWindow( FALSE );
00499             gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_NO_VIDEO_MODE;
00500       }
00501 
00502       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAccountBox);
00503       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFilesBox);
00504       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMercSymbol);
00505       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSpecPortrait);
00506       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiArrow);
00507       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMercVideoPopupBackground);
00508 
00509       UnloadButtonImage( guiAccountBoxButtonImage );
00510       RemoveButton( guiFileBoxButton );
00511       RemoveButton( guiAccountBoxButton );
00512 
00513       RemoveMercBackGround();
00514 
00515       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiMercVideoFaceBackground );
00516 
00517 /*
00518       //Set that we have been here before
00519       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus == MERC_SITE_FIRST_VISIT )
00520             LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus = MERC_SITE_SECOND_VISIT;
00521       else
00522             LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus = MERC_SITE_THIRD_OR_MORE_VISITS;
00523 */
00524 
00525       gfJustEnteredMercSite = TRUE;
00526       gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
00527 
00528       //Remove the merc text box if one is available
00529       RemoveSpeckPopupTextBox();
00530 
00531       //Set up so next time we come in, we know we came from a differnt page
00532       gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE;
00533 
00534       gfJustHiredAMercMerc = FALSE;
00535 
00536       //Since we are leaving the site, set the flag
00537       gfInMercSite = TRUE;
00538 
00539       //Empty the Queue cause Speck could still have a quote in waiting
00540       EmptyDialogueQueue( );
00541 }
00542 
00543 void HandleMercs()
00544 {
00545       if( gfRedrawMercSite ) 
00546       {
00547             RenderMercs();
00548             gfRedrawMercSite = FALSE;
00549             gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn = TRUE;
00550       }
00551 
00552       //if Speck has something to say, say it
00553       if( gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech != MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING )// && !gfDoneIntroSpeech )
00554       {
00555             //if the face isnt active, make it so
00556             if( !gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed )
00557             {
00558                   // Blt the video window background
00559                   DrawMercVideoBackGround();
00560 
00561                   InitDestroyXToCloseVideoWindow( TRUE );
00562 
00563                   InitMercVideoFace();
00564                   gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_INIT_VIDEO_MODE;
00565 
00566 //                gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn = TRUE;
00567             }
00568       }
00569 
00570       //if the page is redrawn, and we are in video conferencing, redraw the VC backgrund graphic
00571       if( gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed && gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn )
00572       {
00573             // Blt the video window background
00574             DrawMercVideoBackGround();
00575 
00576             gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn = FALSE;
00577       }
00578 
00579 
00580       //if Specks should be video conferencing...
00581       if( gubCurrentMercVideoMode != MERC_VIDEO_NO_VIDEO_MODE )
00582       {
00583             HandleTalkingSpeck();
00584       }
00585 
00586       //Reset the some variables
00587       HandleSpeckIdleConversation( FALSE );
00588 
00589       if( fCurrentlyInLaptop == FALSE )
00590       {
00591             //if we are exiting the laptop screen, shut up the speck
00592             StopSpeckFromTalking( );
00593       }
00594 }
00595 
00596 void RenderMercs()
00597 {
00598   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00599 
00600       DrawMecBackGround();
00601 
00602       // Title
00603       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMercSymbol);
00604       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_TITLE_X, MERC_TITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00605 
00606       // Speck Portrait
00607       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSpecPortrait);
00608       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_PORTRAIT_X, MERC_PORTRAIT_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00609 
00610       // Account Box
00611       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiAccountBox);
00612       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_X, MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00613 
00614       // Files Box
00615       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFilesBox);
00616       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, MERC_FILE_BOX_X, MERC_FILE_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00617 
00618       //Text on the Speck Portrait
00619       DisplayWrappedString(MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_X, MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_Y, MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, MERC_TEXT_COLOR, MercHomePageText[MERC_SPECK_OWNER], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00620 
00621       //Text on the Account Box
00622       if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_NO_ACCOUNT )
00623             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_X, MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_Y, MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, MERC_TEXT_COLOR, MercHomePageText[MERC_OPEN_ACCOUNT], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00624       else
00625             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_X, MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_Y, MERC_ACCOUNT_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, MERC_TEXT_COLOR, MercHomePageText[MERC_VIEW_ACCOUNT], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00626 
00627       //Text on the Files Box
00628       DisplayWrappedString(MERC_FILE_BOX_TEXT_X, MERC_FILE_BOX_TEXT_Y, MERC_FILE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, MERC_TEXT_COLOR, MercHomePageText[MERC_VIEW_FILES], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00629 
00630       //If the Specks popup dioalogue box is active, display it.
00631       if( iMercPopUpBox != -1 )
00632       {
00633             DrawButton( guiAccountBoxButton );
00634             ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
00635 
00636             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iMercPopUpBox, gusSpeckDialogueX, MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
00637       }
00638 
00639   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00640       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00641 
00642       //if the page is redrawn, and we are in video conferencing, redraw the VC backgrund graphic
00643       gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn = TRUE;
00644 
00645       ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
00646 
00647   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00648 }

00680 
00681 void BtnAccountBoxButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00682 {
00683       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00684       {
00685             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00686             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00687       }
00688       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00689       {
00690             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00691             {
00692                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00693 
00694                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_NO_ACCOUNT )
00695                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_NO_ACCOUNT;
00696                   else
00697                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_ACCOUNT;
00698 
00699                   if( iMercPopUpBox != -1 )
00700                   {
00701                         ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
00702 
00703                         RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iMercPopUpBox, gusSpeckDialogueX, MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
00704                   }
00705 
00706                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00707             }
00708       }
00709       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00710       {
00711             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00712             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00713       }
00714 } 
00715 
00716 void BtnFileBoxButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00717 {
00718       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00719       {
00720             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00721             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00722       }
00723       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00724       {
00725             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00726             {
00727                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00728 
00729                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_FILES;
00730 
00731                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00732             }
00733       }
00734       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00735       {
00736             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00737             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00738       }
00739 }

00741 
00742 void DailyUpdateOfMercSite( UINT16 usDate)
00743 {
00744       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00745       INT16       sSoldierID, i;
00746       UINT8       ubMercID;
00747       INT32       iNumDays;
00748       BOOLEAN fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn = FALSE;
00749 
00750       //if its the first day, leave
00751       if( usDate == 1 )
00752             return;
00753 
00754       iNumDays = 0;
00755 
00756       //loop through all of the hired mercs from M.E.R.C.
00757       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
00758       {
00759             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( (UINT8) i );
00760             if( IsMercOnTeam( ubMercID ) )
00761             {
00762                   //if it larry Roach burn advance.  ( cause larry is in twice, a sober larry and a stoned larry )
00763                   if( i == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN )
00764                         continue;
00765 
00766                   sSoldierID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ubMercID );
00767                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ sSoldierID ];
00768 
00769                   //if the merc is dead, dont advance the contract length
00770                   if( !IsMercDead( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
00771                   {
00772                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength += 1;
00773 //                      pSoldier->iTotalContractLength++;
00774                   }
00775 
00776                   //Get the longest time
00777                   if( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength > iNumDays )
00778                         iNumDays = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength;
00779             }
00780       }
00781 
00782       //if the players hasnt paid for a while, get email him to tell him to pay
00783       //iTotalContractLength
00784       if( iNumDays > MERC_NUM_DAYS_TILL_ACCOUNT_INVALID )
00785       {
00786             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_INVALID )
00787             {
00788                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_ACCOUNT_INVALID;
00789                   AddEmail( MERC_INVALID, MERC_INVALID_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00790             }
00791       }
00792       else if( iNumDays > MERC_NUM_DAYS_TILL_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED )
00793       {
00794             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED )
00795             {
00796                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED;
00797                   AddEmail( MERC_WARNING, MERC_WARNING_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00798 
00799                   // Have speck complain next time player come to site
00800                   LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags |= SPECK_QUOTE__SENT_EMAIL_ABOUT_LACK_OF_PAYMENT;
00801             }
00802       }
00803       else if( iNumDays > MERC_NUM_DAYS_TILL_FIRST_WARNING)
00804       {
00805             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID_FIRST_WARNING )
00806             {
00807                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID_FIRST_WARNING;
00808                   AddEmail( MERC_FIRST_WARNING, MERC_FIRST_WARNING_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00809 
00810                   // Have speck complain next time player come to site
00811                   LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags |= SPECK_QUOTE__SENT_EMAIL_ABOUT_LACK_OF_PAYMENT;
00812             }
00813       }
00814 
00815 
00816       //Check and act if any new Merc Mercs should become available
00817       ShouldAnyNewMercMercBecomeAvailable();
00818 
00819 /*
00820       //If we should advacne the number of days that the good mercs arrive
00821 //    if( LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays > 4 )
00822       {
00823             UINT8 ubNumDays;
00824             
00825 //          ubNumDays = (UINT8) LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays / 4;
00826             ubNumDays = (UINT8) LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays;
00827 
00828 //          LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays = LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays % 4;
00829             LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays = 0;
00830 
00831             //for the first merc
00832             //if the merc is not already here
00833             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives != -1 )
00834             {
00835                   //We advance the day the merc arrives on
00836                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives > ubNumDays )
00837                   {
00838                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives -= ubNumDays;
00839                   }
00840                   else
00841                   {
00842                         //its time to add the new mercs
00843                         LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_MERCS_AFTER_FIRST_MERC_ARRIVES;
00844 
00845                         //Set the fact that there are new mercs available
00846                         LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = TRUE;
00847 
00848                         //if we havent already sent an email this turn
00849                         if( !fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn )
00850                         {
00851                               AddEmail( NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC, NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00852                               fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn = TRUE;
00853                         }
00854                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives = -1;
00855                   }
00856             }
00857 
00858       
00859             //for the Second merc
00860             //if the merc is not already here
00861             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillSecondMercArrives != -1 )
00862             {
00863                   //We advance the day the merc arrives on
00864                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillSecondMercArrives > ubNumDays )
00865                   {
00866                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillSecondMercArrives -= ubNumDays;
00867                   }
00868                   else
00869                   {
00870                         //its time to add the new mercs
00871                         LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_MERCS_AFTER_SECOND_MERC_ARRIVES;
00872 
00873                         //Set the fact that there are new mercs available
00874                         LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = TRUE;
00875 
00876                         //if we havent already sent an email this turn
00877                         if( !fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn )
00878                         {
00879                               AddEmail( NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC, NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00880                               fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn = TRUE;
00881                         }
00882                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillSecondMercArrives = -1;
00883                   }
00884             }
00885       
00886             //for the Third merc
00887             //if the merc is not already here
00888             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives != -1 )
00889             {
00890                   //We advance the day the merc arrives on
00891                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives > ubNumDays )
00892                   {
00893                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives -= ubNumDays;
00894                   }
00895                   else
00896                   {
00897                         //its time to add the new mercs
00898                         LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_MERCS_AFTER_THIRD_MERC_ARRIVES;
00899 
00900                         //Set the fact that there are new mercs available
00901                         LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = TRUE;
00902 
00903                         //if we havent already sent an email this turn
00904                         if( !fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn )
00905                         {
00906                               AddEmail( NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC, NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00907                               fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn = TRUE;
00908                         }
00909                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives = -1;
00910                   }
00911             }
00912       
00913             //for the Fourth merc
00914             //if the merc is not already here
00915             if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives != -1 )
00916             {
00917                   //We advance the day the merc arrives on
00918                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives > ubNumDays )
00919                   {
00920                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives -= ubNumDays;
00921                   }
00922                   else
00923                   {
00924                         //its time to add the new mercs
00925                         LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_MERCS_AFTER_FOURTH_MERC_ARRIVES;
00926 
00927                         //Set the fact that there are new mercs available
00928                         LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = TRUE;
00929 
00930                         //if we havent already sent an email this turn
00931                         if( !fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn )
00932                         {
00933                               AddEmail( NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC, NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
00934                               fAlreadySentEmailToPlayerThisTurn = TRUE;
00935                         }
00936                         LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives = -1;
00937                   }
00938             }
00939       }
00940 */
00941 
00942       // If the merc site has never gone down, the number of MERC payment days is above 'X', 
00943       // and the players account status is ok ( cant have the merc site going down when the player owes him money, player may lose account that way )
00944       if( ShouldTheMercSiteServerGoDown() )
00945       {
00946             UINT32      uiTimeInMinutes=0;
00947 
00948 
00949             //Set the fact the site has gone down
00950             LaptopSaveInfo.fMercSiteHasGoneDownYet = TRUE;
00951 
00952 //No lnger removing the bookmark, leave it up, and the user will go to the broken link page
00953             //Remove the book mark
00954 //          RemoveBookMark( MERC_BOOKMARK );
00955 
00956             //Get the site up the next day at 6:00 pm       
00957             uiTimeInMinutes = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 ) + 18 * 60;
00958 
00959             //Add an event that will get the site back up and running
00960             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_MERC_SITE_BACK_ONLINE, uiTimeInMinutes, 0 );
00961       }
00962 }
00963 
00964 
00965 //Gets the actual merc id from the array
00966 UINT8 GetMercIDFromMERCArray(UINT8 ubMercID)
00967 {
00968       //if it is one of the regular MERCS
00969       if( ubMercID <= 6 )
00970       {
00971             return( gubMercArray[ ubMercID ] );
00972       }
00973 
00974       //if it is Larry, determine if it Stoned larry or straight larry
00975       else if( ( ubMercID == 7 ) || ( ubMercID == 8 ) )
00976       {
00977             if ( HasLarryRelapsed() )
00978             {
00979                   return( gubMercArray[ 8 ] );
00980             }
00981             else
00982             {
00983                   return( gubMercArray[ 7 ] );
00984             }
00985       }
00986 
00987       //if it is one of the newer mercs
00988       else if( ubMercID <= LAST_MERC_ID )
00989       {
00990             return( gubMercArray[ ubMercID ] );
00991       }
00992 
00993       //else its an error
00994       else
00995       {
00996             Assert(0);
00997             return( TRUE );
00998       }
00999 }

01027 
01028 void InitMercVideoFace()
01029 {
01030       //Alocates space, and loads the sti for SPECK
01031 //    giVideoSpeckFaceIndex = InternalInitFace( NO_PROFILE, NOBODY, 0, MERC_VIDEO_MERC_ID_FOR_SPECKS, 3000, 2000 );
01032             giVideoSpeckFaceIndex = InitFace( MERC_VIDEO_MERC_ID_FOR_SPECKS, NOBODY, 0 );
01033 
01034       // Sets up the eyes blinking and the mouth moving
01035 //    InternalSetAutoFaceActive( guiMercVideoFaceBackground, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER , giVideoSpeckFaceIndex, 0, 0, 8, 9, 7, 25 );
01036             SetAutoFaceActive( guiMercVideoFaceBackground, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER , giVideoSpeckFaceIndex, 0, 0);
01037 
01038       
01039       //Renders the face to the background
01040       RenderAutoFace( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex );
01041 
01042       //enables the global flag indicating the the video is being displayed
01043       gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed = TRUE;
01044 
01045 }
01046 
01047 
01048 BOOLEAN  StartSpeckTalking(UINT16 usQuoteNum)
01049 {
01050       if( usQuoteNum == MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING || usQuoteNum == MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_HAS_TO_TALK_BUT_QUOTE_NOT_CHOSEN_YET )
01051             return( FALSE );
01052 
01053       //Reset the time for when speck starts to do the random quotes
01054       HandleSpeckIdleConversation( TRUE );
01055 
01056       //Start Speck talking
01057       if(!CharacterDialogue( MERC_VIDEO_MERC_ID_FOR_SPECKS, usQuoteNum, giVideoSpeckFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SPECK_CONTACT_PAGE_UI, FALSE, FALSE ) )
01058       {
01059             Assert(0);
01060             return(FALSE);
01061       }
01062 
01063       gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
01064 
01065       return(TRUE);
01066 }
01067 
01068 // Performs the frame by frame update 
01069 BOOLEAN HandleSpeckTalking( BOOLEAN fReset )
01070 {
01071       static BOOLEAN fWasTheMercTalking=FALSE;
01072       BOOLEAN           fIsTheMercTalking;
01073       SGPRect           SrcRect;
01074       SGPRect           DestRect;
01075 
01076       if( fReset )
01077       {
01078             fWasTheMercTalking = FALSE;
01079             return( TRUE );
01080       }
01081 
01082       SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
01083       SrcRect.iTop = 0;
01084       SrcRect.iRight = 48;
01085       SrcRect.iBottom = 43;
01086 
01087       DestRect.iLeft = MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X;
01088       DestRect.iTop = MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y;
01089       DestRect.iRight = DestRect.iLeft + MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH;
01090       DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT;
01091 
01092       HandleDialogue();
01093       HandleAutoFaces( );
01094       HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
01095 
01096       //Blt the face surface to the video background surface
01097       if(   !BltStretchVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, guiMercVideoFaceBackground, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, &SrcRect, &DestRect ) )
01098             return(FALSE);
01099 
01100       //HandleCurrentMercDistortion();
01101 
01102       InvalidateRegion(MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_X, MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_Y, (MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_X + MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_WIDTH), (MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_Y + MERC_VIDEO_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT) );
01103 
01104       //find out if the merc just stopped talking
01105       fIsTheMercTalking = gFacesData[ giVideoSpeckFaceIndex ].fTalking;
01106 
01107       //if the merc just stopped talking
01108       if(fWasTheMercTalking && !fIsTheMercTalking)
01109       {
01110             fWasTheMercTalking = FALSE;
01111 
01112             if( DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) )
01113             {
01114                   RemoveSpeckPopupTextBox();
01115 
01116                   gfDisplaySpeckTextBox = FALSE;
01117 
01118                   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
01119 
01120                   //Reset the time for when speck starts to do the random quotes
01121                   HandleSpeckIdleConversation( TRUE );
01122             }
01123             else
01124                   fIsTheMercTalking = TRUE;
01125       }
01126 
01127       fWasTheMercTalking = fIsTheMercTalking;
01128 
01129       return(fIsTheMercTalking);
01130 }
01131 
01132 
01133 void HandleCurrentMercDistortion()
01134 {
01135       static UINT8 ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISTORTION_NO_DISTORTION;
01136       BOOLEAN fReturnStatus;
01137 
01138       //if there is no current distortion mode, randomly choose one
01139       if( ubCurrentMercDistortionMode == MERC_DISTORTION_NO_DISTORTION )
01140       {
01141             UINT8 ubRandom;
01142 
01143             ubRandom = (UINT8)Random(200);
01144 
01145             if( ubRandom < 40 )
01146             {
01147                   ubRandom = (UINT8)Random(100);
01148                   if( ubRandom < 10 )
01149                         ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISRTORTION_DISTORT_IMAGE;
01150                   else if( ubRandom < 30 )
01151                         ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISTORTION_PIXELATE_UP;
01152             }
01153       }
01154 
01155       // Perform whichever video distortion mode is current
01156       switch( ubCurrentMercDistortionMode )
01157       {
01158             case MERC_DISTORTION_NO_DISTORTION:
01159                   break;
01160 
01161             case MERC_DISTORTION_PIXELATE_UP:
01162 //                fReturnStatus = PixelateVideoMercImage( TRUE );
01163                   fReturnStatus = PixelateVideoMercImage( TRUE, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT );
01164                   if( fReturnStatus )
01165                         ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISTORTION_PIXELATE_DOWN;
01166                   break;
01167             
01168             case MERC_DISTORTION_PIXELATE_DOWN:
01169 //                fReturnStatus = PixelateVideoMercImage( FALSE );
01170                   fReturnStatus = PixelateVideoMercImage( FALSE, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT );
01171                   if( fReturnStatus )
01172                         ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISTORTION_NO_DISTORTION;
01173                   break;
01174 
01175             case MERC_DISRTORTION_DISTORT_IMAGE:
01176 //                fReturnStatus = DistortVideoMercImage();
01177                   fReturnStatus = DistortVideoMercImage( MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT );
01178 
01179                   if( fReturnStatus )
01180                         ubCurrentMercDistortionMode = MERC_DISTORTION_NO_DISTORTION;
01181                   break;
01182       }
01183 }
01184 
01185 
01186 BOOLEAN PixelateVideoMercImage( BOOLEAN fUp, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight)
01187 {
01188       static UINT32     uiLastTime;
01189       UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
01190       UINT16 *pBuffer=NULL, DestColor;
01191       UINT32 uiPitch;
01192       UINT16 i, j;
01193       static UINT8 ubPixelationAmount=255;
01194       BOOLEAN fReturnStatus=FALSE;
01195       i=0;
01196 
01197       pBuffer = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiPitch );
01198       Assert( pBuffer );
01199 
01200       if( ubPixelationAmount == 255 )
01201       {
01202             if( fUp )
01203                   ubPixelationAmount = 1;
01204             else
01205                   ubPixelationAmount = 4;
01206             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01207       }
01208 
01209       //is it time to change the animation
01210       if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > 100 )
01211       {
01212             //if we are starting to pixelate the image
01213             if( fUp )
01214             {
01215                   //the varying degrees of pixelation
01216                   if( ubPixelationAmount <= 4 )
01217                   {
01218                         ubPixelationAmount++;
01219                         fReturnStatus = FALSE;
01220                   }
01221                   else
01222                   {
01223                         ubPixelationAmount = 255;
01224                         fReturnStatus = TRUE;
01225                   }
01226             }
01227             //else we are pixelating down
01228             else
01229             {
01230                   if( ubPixelationAmount > 1 )
01231                   {
01232                         ubPixelationAmount--;
01233                         fReturnStatus = FALSE;
01234                   }
01235                   else
01236                   {
01237                         ubPixelationAmount = 255;
01238                         fReturnStatus = TRUE;
01239                   }
01240             }
01241             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01242       }
01243       else
01244             i=i;
01245 
01246       uiPitch /= 2;
01247       i=j=0;
01248       DestColor = pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i ];
01249 
01250       for(j=usPosY; j<usPosY+usHeight; j++)
01251       {
01252             for(i=usPosX; i<usPosX+usWidth; i++)
01253             {
01254                   //get the next color
01255                   if( !(i % ubPixelationAmount) )
01256                   {
01257                         if( i < usPosX+usWidth-ubPixelationAmount)
01258                               DestColor = pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i+ubPixelationAmount/2];
01259                         else
01260                               DestColor = pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i];
01261                   }
01262 
01263                   pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i] = DestColor;
01264             }
01265       }
01266 
01267       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01268 
01269       return( fReturnStatus );
01270 }
01271 
01272 
01273 
01274 
01275 
01276 
01277 BOOLEAN DistortVideoMercImage( UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight )
01278 {
01279       UINT32 uiPitch;
01280       UINT16 i, j;
01281       UINT16 *pBuffer=NULL, DestColor;
01282       UINT32 uiColor;
01283       UINT8 red, green, blue;
01284       static UINT16 usDistortionValue=255;
01285       UINT8 uiReturnValue;
01286       UINT16      usEndOnLine=0;
01287 
01288       pBuffer = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiPitch );
01289       Assert( pBuffer );
01290 
01291       uiPitch /= 2;
01292       j=MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y;
01293       i=MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X;
01294 
01295       DestColor = pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i ];
01296 
01297       if( usDistortionValue >= usPosY+usHeight )
01298       {
01299             usDistortionValue = 0;
01300             uiReturnValue = TRUE;
01301       }
01302       else
01303       {
01304             usDistortionValue++;
01305 
01306             uiReturnValue = FALSE;
01307 
01308 
01309             if( usDistortionValue + 10 >= usHeight )
01310                   usEndOnLine = usHeight-1;
01311             else
01312                   usEndOnLine = usDistortionValue + 10;
01313 
01314 
01315             for(j=usPosY+usDistortionValue; j<usPosY+usEndOnLine; j++)
01316             {
01317                   for(i=usPosX; i<usPosX+usWidth; i++)
01318                   {
01319                         DestColor = pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i ];
01320 
01321                         uiColor = GetRGBColor( DestColor );
01322 
01323                         red = (UINT8)uiColor;
01324                         green = (UINT8)(uiColor >> 8);
01325                         blue = (UINT8)(uiColor >> 16);
01326 
01327                         DestColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB( 255-red, 250-green, 250-blue) );
01328 
01329                         pBuffer[ (j*uiPitch) + i ] = DestColor;
01330                   }
01331             }
01332       }
01333       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01334 
01335       return(uiReturnValue);
01336 }
01337

01339 
01340 
01341 BOOLEAN InitDestroyXToCloseVideoWindow( BOOLEAN fCreate )
01342 {
01343       static BOOLEAN fButtonCreated=FALSE;
01344 
01345       //if we are asked to create the buttons and the button isnt already created
01346       if( fCreate && !fButtonCreated )
01347       {
01348             guiXToCloseMercVideoButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\CloseButton.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
01349 
01350             guiXToCloseMercVideoButton = QuickCreateButton( guiXToCloseMercVideoButtonImage, MERC_X_TO_CLOSE_VIDEO_X, MERC_X_TO_CLOSE_VIDEO_Y,
01351                                                                                                       BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01352                                                                                                       DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnXToCloseMercVideoButtonCallback);
01353             SetButtonCursor(guiXToCloseMercVideoButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
01354 
01355             fButtonCreated = TRUE;
01356       }
01357 
01358       //if we are asked to destroy the buttons and the buttons are created
01359       if( !fCreate && fButtonCreated )
01360       {
01361             UnloadButtonImage( guiXToCloseMercVideoButtonImage );
01362             RemoveButton( guiXToCloseMercVideoButton );
01363             fButtonCreated = FALSE;
01364       }
01365 
01366       return(TRUE);
01367 }
01368 
01369 
01370 void BtnXToCloseMercVideoButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01371 {
01372       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01373       {
01374             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01375             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01376       }
01377       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01378       {
01379             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01380             {
01381                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01382 
01383                   //Stop speck from talking
01384 //                ShutupaYoFace( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex );
01385                   StopSpeckFromTalking( );
01386 
01387                   //make sure we are done the intro speech
01388                   gfDoneIntroSpeech = TRUE;
01389 
01390                   //remove the video conf mode
01391                   gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_EXIT_VIDEO_MODE;
01392 
01393                   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
01394 
01395                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01396             }
01397       }
01398       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01399       {
01400             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01401             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01402       }
01403 } 
01404 
01405 
01406 BOOLEAN DisplayMercVideoIntro( UINT16 usTimeTillFinish )
01407 {
01408       UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
01409       static UINT32     uiLastTime=0;
01410 
01411       //init variable
01412       if( uiLastTime == 0 )
01413             uiLastTime = uiCurTime;
01414 
01415 
01416       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X+MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y+MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01417 
01418       //if the intro is done
01419       if( (uiCurTime - uiLastTime) > usTimeTillFinish )
01420       {
01421             uiLastTime = 0;
01422             return(TRUE);
01423       }
01424       else
01425             return(FALSE);
01426 }
01427 
01428 
01429 void HandleTalkingSpeck()
01430 {
01431       BOOLEAN fIsSpeckTalking = TRUE;
01432 
01433       switch( gubCurrentMercVideoMode )
01434       {
01435             //Init the video conferencing
01436             case MERC_VIDEO_INIT_VIDEO_MODE:
01437                   //perform some opening animation.  When its done start Speck talking
01438 
01439                   //if the intro is finished
01440                   if( DisplayMercVideoIntro( MERC_INTRO_TIME ) )
01441                   {
01442                         //NULL out the string
01443                         gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp[0] = '\0';
01444 
01445                         //Start speck talking
01446                         if( gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech != MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING ||   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech != MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_HAS_TO_TALK_BUT_QUOTE_NOT_CHOSEN_YET )
01447                               StartSpeckTalking( gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech );
01448 
01449                         gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
01450                         gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_VIDEO_MODE;
01451                   }
01452                   break;
01453 
01454             //Display his talking and blinking face
01455             case MERC_VIDEO_VIDEO_MODE:
01456 
01457                   //Make sure the accounts button does not overwrite the dialog text
01458 //                ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01459                   //def:
01460 
01461                   if( gfJustEnteredMercSite && gubArrivedFromMercSubSite != MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE || gfFirstTimeIntoMERCSiteSinceEnteringLaptop )
01462                   {
01463                         gfFirstTimeIntoMERCSiteSinceEnteringLaptop = FALSE;
01464                         GetSpeckConditionalOpening( FALSE );
01465                         gfJustEnteredMercSite = FALSE;
01466                   }
01467                   else
01468                   {
01469                         fIsSpeckTalking = HandleSpeckTalking( FALSE );
01470 
01471                         if( !fIsSpeckTalking )
01472                               fIsSpeckTalking = GetSpeckConditionalOpening( FALSE );
01473 
01474                         //if speck didnt start talking, see if he just hired someone
01475                         if( !fIsSpeckTalking )
01476                         {
01477                               fIsSpeckTalking = ShouldSpeckStartTalkingDueToActionOnSubPage();
01478                         }
01479                   }
01480 
01481                   if( !fIsSpeckTalking )
01482                         gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_EXIT_VIDEO_MODE;
01483 
01484                   if( gfDisplaySpeckTextBox && gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
01485                   {
01486                         if( !gfInMercSite )
01487                         {
01488                               StopSpeckFromTalking( );
01489                               return;
01490                         }
01491 
01492                         
01493                         if( gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp[0] != L'\0' )
01494                         {
01495 //                            DrawButton( guiAccountBoxButton );
01496 //                            ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01497 
01498                               if( iMercPopUpBox != -1 )
01499                               {
01500                                     DrawButton( guiAccountBoxButton );
01501                                     ButtonList[ guiAccountBoxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01502 
01503                                     RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iMercPopUpBox, gusSpeckDialogueX, MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
01504                               }
01505                         }
01506                   }
01507 
01508                   break;
01509 
01510             // shut down the video conferencing
01511             case MERC_VIDEO_EXIT_VIDEO_MODE:
01512                   
01513                   //if the exit animation is finished, exit the video conf window
01514                   if( DisplayMercVideoIntro( MERC_EXIT_TIME ) )
01515                   {
01516                         StopSpeckFromTalking( );
01517 
01518                         //Delete the face
01519                         DeleteFace( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex  );
01520                         InitDestroyXToCloseVideoWindow( FALSE );
01521 
01522                         gfRedrawMercSite = TRUE;
01523                         gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed = FALSE;
01524 
01525                         //Remove the merc popup
01526                         RemoveSpeckPopupTextBox();
01527 
01528                         //maybe display ending animation
01529                         gubCurrentMercVideoMode = MERC_VIDEO_NO_VIDEO_MODE;
01530                   }
01531                   else
01532                   {
01533                         //else we are done the exit animation.  The area is not being invalidated anymore
01534                         InvalidateRegion( MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y, MERC_VIDEO_FACE_X+MERC_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH,      MERC_VIDEO_FACE_Y+MERC_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT );
01535                   }
01536                   break;
01537             }
01538 }
01539 
01540 void DisplayTextForSpeckVideoPopUp(INT16 * pString)
01541 {
01542       UINT16      usActualHeight;
01543       INT32       iOldMercPopUpBoxId = iMercPopUpBox;
01544 
01545       //If the user has selected no subtitles
01546       if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
01547             return;
01548 
01549 //    wcscpy(gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp, pString);
01550       //add the "" around the speech.
01551 #ifdef TAIWANESE
01552       swprintf( gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp, L"%s", pString );
01553 #else
01554       swprintf( gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp, L"\"%s\"", pString );
01555 #endif
01556 
01557       gfDisplaySpeckTextBox = TRUE;
01558 
01559       //Set this so the popup box doesnt render in RenderMercs()
01560       iMercPopUpBox = -1;
01561       
01562       //Render the screen to get rid of any old text popup boxes
01563       RenderMercs();
01564 
01565       iMercPopUpBox = iOldMercPopUpBoxId;
01566 
01567       if( gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed && gfMercSiteScreenIsReDrawn )
01568       {
01569             DrawMercVideoBackGround();
01570       }
01571 
01572       //Create the popup box
01573   SET_USE_WINFONTS( TRUE );
01574   SET_WINFONT( giSubTitleWinFont );       
01575   iMercPopUpBox = PrepareMercPopupBox( iMercPopUpBox, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, gsSpeckDialogueTextPopUp, 300, 0, 0, 0, &gusSpeckDialogueActualWidth, &usActualHeight);
01576   SET_USE_WINFONTS( FALSE );
01577 
01578       gusSpeckDialogueX = iScreenWidthOffset + 111 + ((640 - 111) / 2 - (gusSpeckDialogueActualWidth / 2));
01579 
01580       //Render the pop box
01581       RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iMercPopUpBox, gusSpeckDialogueX, MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
01582 
01583       //check to make sure the region is not already initialized
01584       if( !( gMercSiteSubTitleMouseRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS ) )
01585       {
01586             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMercSiteSubTitleMouseRegion, gusSpeckDialogueX, MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y, (INT16)(gusSpeckDialogueX + gusSpeckDialogueActualWidth), (INT16)(MERC_TEXT_BOX_POS_Y + usActualHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01587                                                        CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MercSiteSubTitleRegionCallBack ); 
01588             MSYS_AddRegion( &gMercSiteSubTitleMouseRegion );
01589       }
01590 }

01593 
01594 void CheatToGetAll5Merc()
01595 {
01596       LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays += 20;
01597 
01598 /*
01599       LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives = 1;
01600       LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillSecondMercArrives = 1;
01601       LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives = 1;
01602       LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives = 1;
01603 */
01604       LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = NUMBER_MERCS_AFTER_FOURTH_MERC_ARRIVES;
01605 }
01606 
01607 
01608 BOOLEAN     GetSpeckConditionalOpening( BOOLEAN fJustEnteredScreen )
01609 {
01610       static UINT16     usQuoteToSay=MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
01611       UINT8 ubRandom=0;
01612       UINT8 ubCnt;
01613       BOOLEAN     fCanSayLackOfPaymentQuote = TRUE;
01614       BOOLEAN fCanUseIdleTag = FALSE;
01615 
01616       //If we just entered the screen, reset some variables
01617       if( fJustEnteredScreen )
01618       {
01619             gfDoneIntroSpeech = FALSE;
01620             usQuoteToSay = 0;
01621             return( FALSE );
01622       }
01623 
01624       //if we are done the intro speech, or arrived from a sub page, get out of the function
01625       if( gfDoneIntroSpeech || gubArrivedFromMercSubSite != MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE )
01626       {
01627             return( FALSE );
01628       }
01629 
01630       gfDoneIntroSpeech = TRUE;
01631 
01632       //set the opening quote based on if the player has been here before
01633       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus == MERC_SITE_FIRST_VISIT && usQuoteToSay <= 8 ) //!= 0 )
01634       {
01635             StartSpeckTalking( usQuoteToSay );
01636             usQuoteToSay++;
01637             if( usQuoteToSay <= 8 )
01638                   gfDoneIntroSpeech = FALSE;
01639       }
01640 
01641       //if its the players second visit
01642       else if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubPlayerBeenToMercSiteStatus == MERC_SITE_SECOND_VISIT )
01643       {
01644             StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_1_TOUGH_START );
01645             fCanUseIdleTag = TRUE;
01646       }
01647 
01648       // We have been here at least 2 times before, Check which quote we should use
01649       else
01650       {
01651             //if the player has not hired any MERC mercs before
01652             // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing this, so near-bankrupt msg will play
01653             if( !IsAnyMercMercsHired( ) && CalcMercDaysServed() == 0)
01654             {
01655                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_2_BUSINESS_BAD );
01656             }
01657 
01658             //else if it is the first visit since the server went down
01659             else if( LaptopSaveInfo.fFirstVisitSinceServerWentDown == TRUE )
01660             {
01661                   LaptopSaveInfo.fFirstVisitSinceServerWentDown = 2;
01662                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_9_FIRST_VISIT_SINCE_SERVER_WENT_DOWN );
01663                   fCanUseIdleTag = TRUE;
01664             }
01665 /*
01666             //else if new mercs are available
01667             else if( LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite )
01668             {
01669                   LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = FALSE;
01670 
01671                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_11_NEW_MERCS_AVAILABLE );
01672             }
01673 */
01674             //else if lots of MERC mercs are DEAD, and speck can say the quote ( dont want him to continously say it )
01675             else if( CountNumberOfMercMercsWhoAreDead() >= 2 && LaptopSaveInfo.ubSpeckCanSayPlayersLostQuote )
01676             {
01677                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_12_PLAYERS_LOST_MERCS );
01678 
01679                   //Set it so speck Wont say the quote again till someone else dies
01680                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubSpeckCanSayPlayersLostQuote = 0;
01681             }
01682 
01683             //else if player owes lots of money
01684             else if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED )
01685             {
01686                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_5_PLAYER_OWES_SPECK_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED );
01687 
01688                   fCanSayLackOfPaymentQuote = FALSE;
01689             }
01690 
01691             //else if the player owes speck a large sum of money, have speck say so
01692             else if( CalculateHowMuchPlayerOwesSpeck() > 5000 )
01693             {
01694                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_6_PLAYER_OWES_SPECK_ALMOST_BANKRUPT_1 );
01695                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_6_PLAYER_OWES_SPECK_ALMOST_BANKRUPT_2 );
01696 
01697                   fCanSayLackOfPaymentQuote = FALSE;
01698             }
01699 
01700             else
01701             {
01702                   UINT8 ubNumMercsDead = NumberOfMercMercsDead();
01703                   UINT8 ubRandom = ( UINT8 ) Random( 100 );
01704 
01705                   //if business is good
01706 //                if( ubRandom < 40 && ubNumMercsDead < 2 && CountNumberOfMercMercsHired() > 1 )
01707                   if( ubRandom < 40 && AreAnyOfTheNewMercsAvailable() && CountNumberOfMercMercsHired() > 1 )
01708                   {
01709                         StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_3_BUSINESS_GOOD );
01710                         fCanUseIdleTag = TRUE;
01711                   }
01712 
01713                   //or if still trying to recruit ( the last recruit hasnt arrived and the player has paid for some of his mercs )
01714 //                else if( ubRandom < 80 && LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFourthMercArrives != -1 && LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillFirstMercArrives < MERC_NUM_DAYS_TILL_FIRST_MERC_AVAILABLE )
01715                   else if( ubRandom < 80 && gConditionsForMercAvailability[ LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId ].usMoneyPaid <= LaptopSaveInfo.uiTotalMoneyPaidToSpeck && CanMercBeAvailableYet( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId ) )
01716                   {
01717                         StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_4_TRYING_TO_RECRUIT );
01718                         fCanUseIdleTag = TRUE;
01719                   }
01720 
01721                   //else use the generic opening
01722                   else
01723                   {
01724                         StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_10_GENERIC_OPENING );
01725                         fCanUseIdleTag = TRUE;
01726 
01727                         //if the  merc hasnt said the line before
01728                         if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fSaidGenericOpeningInMercSite )
01729                         {
01730                               LaptopSaveInfo.fSaidGenericOpeningInMercSite = TRUE;
01731                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_10_TAG_FOR_20 );
01732                         }
01733                   }
01734             }
01735 
01736             if( fCanUseIdleTag )
01737             {
01738                   UINT8 ubRandom = Random( 100 );
01739 
01740                   if( ubRandom < 50 )
01741                   {
01742                         ubRandom = Random( 4 );
01743 
01744                         switch( ubRandom )
01745                         {
01746                               case 0:
01747                                     StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_ON_AFTER_OTHER_TAGS_1 );
01748                                     break;
01749                               case 1:
01750                                     StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_ON_AFTER_OTHER_TAGS_2 );
01751                                     break;
01752                               case 2:
01753                                     StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_ON_AFTER_OTHER_TAGS_3 );
01754                                     break;
01755                               case 3:
01756                                     StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_ON_AFTER_OTHER_TAGS_4 );
01757                                     break;
01758                               default:
01759                                     Assert( 0 );
01760                         }
01761                   }
01762             }
01763       }
01764 
01765 
01766       //If Speck has sent an email to the player, and the player still hasnt paid, has speck complain about it.
01767       // CJC Dec 1 2002 ACTUALLY HOOKED IN THAT CHECK
01768       if (fCanSayLackOfPaymentQuote)
01769       {
01770             if( LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags & SPECK_QUOTE__SENT_EMAIL_ABOUT_LACK_OF_PAYMENT )
01771             {
01772                   LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags &= ~SPECK_QUOTE__SENT_EMAIL_ABOUT_LACK_OF_PAYMENT;
01773 
01774                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_PLAYER_OWES_MONEY );
01775             }
01776       }
01777 
01778       //if new mercs are available
01779       if( LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite )
01780       {
01781             LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = FALSE;
01782 
01783             StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_11_NEW_MERCS_AVAILABLE );
01784       }
01785 
01786       //if any mercs are dead
01787       if( IsAnyMercMercsDead() )
01788       {
01789             UINT8 ubMercID;
01790             //if no merc has died before
01791             if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fHasAMercDiedAtMercSite )
01792             {
01793                   LaptopSaveInfo.fHasAMercDiedAtMercSite = TRUE;
01794                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_FIRST_MERC_DIES );
01795             }
01796 
01797             //loop through all the mercs and see if any are dead and the quote is not said
01798             for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; ubCnt++ )
01799             {
01800                   ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( (UINT8) ubCnt );
01801                   //if the merc is dead
01802                   if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
01803                   {
01804                         //if the quote has not been said
01805                         if( !( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_MERC_MERC_IS_DEAD_AND_QUOTE_SAID ) )
01806                         {
01807                               //set the flag
01808                               gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].ubMiscFlags3 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_MERC_MERC_IS_DEAD_AND_QUOTE_SAID;
01809 
01810                               switch( ubMercID )
01811                               {
01812                                     case BIFF:
01813                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_BIFF_IS_DEAD );
01814                                           break;
01815                                     case HAYWIRE:
01816                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_HAYWIRE_IS_DEAD );
01817                                           break;
01818                                     case GASKET:
01819                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_GASKET_IS_DEAD );
01820                                           break;
01821                                     case RAZOR:
01822                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_RAZOR_IS_DEAD );
01823                                           break;
01824                                     case FLO:
01825                                           //if biff is dead
01826                                           if( IsMercDead( BIFF ) )
01827                                                 StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_FLO_IS_DEAD_BIFF_IS_DEAD );
01828                                           else
01829                                           {
01830                                                 StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_FLO_IS_DEAD_BIFF_ALIVE );
01831                                                 MakeBiffAwayForCoupleOfDays();
01832                                           }
01833                                           break;
01834 
01835                                     case GUMPY:
01836                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_GUMPY_IS_DEAD );
01837                                           break;
01838                                     case LARRY_NORMAL:
01839                                     case LARRY_DRUNK:
01840                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_LARRY_IS_DEAD );
01841                                           break;
01842                                     case COUGAR:
01843                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_COUGER_IS_DEAD );
01844                                           break;
01845                                     case NUMB:
01846                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_NUMB_IS_DEAD );
01847                                           break;
01848                                     case BUBBA:
01849                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_BUBBA_IS_DEAD );
01850                                           break;
01851                                     case GASTON:
01852                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_GASTON_DEAD );
01853                                           break;
01854                                     case STOGIE:
01855                                           StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_STOGIE_DEAD );
01856                                           break;
01857                               };
01858 
01859                         }
01860                   }
01861             }
01862       }
01863 
01864 
01865       //if flo has married the cousin
01866       if( gubFact[ FACT_PC_MARRYING_DARYL_IS_FLO ] )
01867       {
01868             //if speck hasnt said the quote before, and Biff is NOT dead
01869             if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fSpeckSaidFloMarriedCousinQuote && !IsMercDead( BIFF ) )
01870             {
01871                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_FLO_MARRIED_A_COUSIN_BIFF_IS_ALIVE );
01872                   LaptopSaveInfo.fSpeckSaidFloMarriedCousinQuote = TRUE;
01873 
01874                   MakeBiffAwayForCoupleOfDays();
01875             }
01876       }
01877 
01878 
01879       //if larry has relapsed
01880       if( HasLarryRelapsed() && !( LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags & SPECK_QUOTE__ALREADY_TOLD_PLAYER_THAT_LARRY_RELAPSED ) )
01881       {
01882             LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags |= SPECK_QUOTE__ALREADY_TOLD_PLAYER_THAT_LARRY_RELAPSED;
01883 
01884             StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_TAG_LARRY_RELAPSED );
01885       }
01886 
01887       return( TRUE );
01888 }

01892 
01893 BOOLEAN IsAnyMercMercsHired( )
01894 {
01895       UINT8 ubMercID;
01896       UINT8 i;
01897 
01898       //loop through all of the hired mercs from M.E.R.C.
01899       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
01900       {
01901             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
01902             if( IsMercOnTeam( ubMercID ) )
01903             {
01904                   return( TRUE );
01905             }
01906       }
01907 
01908       return( FALSE );
01909 }
01910 
01911 BOOLEAN IsAnyMercMercsDead()
01912 {
01913       UINT8 i;
01914       UINT8 ubMercID;
01915 
01916       //loop through all of the hired mercs from M.E.R.C.
01917       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
01918       {
01919             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( (UINT8) i );
01920             if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD )
01921                   return( TRUE );
01922       }
01923 
01924       return( FALSE );
01925 }
01926 
01927 
01928 UINT8 NumberOfMercMercsDead()
01929 {
01930       UINT8 i;
01931       UINT8 ubNumDead = 0;
01932       UINT8 ubMercID;
01933 
01934       //loop through all of the hired mercs from M.E.R.C.
01935       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
01936       {
01937             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( (UINT8) i );
01938             if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD )
01939                   ubNumDead++;
01940       }
01941 
01942       return( ubNumDead );
01943 }

01955       {
01956             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );

01958             {
01959                   ubCount++;
01960             }
01961       }

01981             }

01990 //Mouse Call back for the pop up text box
01991 void MercSiteSubTitleRegionCallBack( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01992 {
01993       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01994       {
01995       }
01996       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP || iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01997       {
01998             StopSpeckFromTalking( );
01999       }
02000 }

02002 
02003 void RemoveSpeckPopupTextBox()
02004 {
02005       if( iMercPopUpBox == -1 )
02006             return;
02007 
02008       if( gMercSiteSubTitleMouseRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
02009             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMercSiteSubTitleMouseRegion );
02010 
02011       if( RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iMercPopUpBox ) )
02012       {
02013             iMercPopUpBox = -1;
02014       }
02015 
02016       //redraw the screen
02017       gfRedrawMercSite = TRUE;
02018 }

02021 
02022 void HandlePlayerHiringMerc( UINT8 ubHiredMercID )
02023 {
02024       gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
02025 
02026       //if the players is in good finacial standing
02027 //DEF: 3/19/99: Dont know why this was done
02028 //    if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance >= 2000 )
02029       {
02030             //determine which quote to say based on the merc that was hired
02031             switch( ubHiredMercID )
02032             {
02033                   //Biff is hired
02034                   case BIFF:
02035                         //if Larry is available, advertise for larry
02036                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( LARRY_NORMAL ) || IsMercMercAvailable( LARRY_DRUNK ) )
02037                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_BIFF_SPECK_PLUGS_LARRY );
02038 
02039                         //if flo is available, advertise for flo
02040                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( FLO ) )
02041                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_BIFF_SPECK_PLUGS_FLO );
02042                         break;
02043 
02044                   //haywire is hired
02045                   case HAYWIRE:
02046                         //if razor is available, advertise for razor
02047                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( RAZOR ) )
02048                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_HAYWIRE_SPECK_PLUGS_RAZOR );
02049                         break;
02050 
02051                   //razor is hired
02052                   case RAZOR:
02053                         //if haywire is available, advertise for haywire
02054                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( HAYWIRE ) )
02055                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_RAZOR_SPECK_PLUGS_HAYWIRE );
02056                         break;
02057 
02058 
02059                   //flo is hired
02060                   case FLO:
02061                         //if biff is available, advertise for biff
02062                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( BIFF ) )
02063                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_FLO_SPECK_PLUGS_BIFF );
02064                         break;
02065 
02066 
02067                   //larry is hired
02068                   case LARRY_NORMAL:
02069                   case LARRY_DRUNK:
02070                         //if biff is available, advertise for biff
02071                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( BIFF ) )
02072                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYERS_HIRES_LARRY_SPECK_PLUGS_BIFF );
02073                         break;
02074 
02075                   //Gaston is hired
02076                   case GASTON:
02077                         //if biff is available, advertise for biff
02078                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( FLO ) )
02079                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_HIRES_GASTON );
02080                         break;
02081 
02082                   //Stogie is hired
02083                   case STOGIE:
02084                         //if biff is available, advertise for biff
02085                         if( IsMercMercAvailable( BIFF ) )
02086                               StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_HIRES_STOGIE );
02087                         break;
02088 
02089             }
02090       }
02091 
02092       gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_HIRE_PAGE;
02093 }

02095 
02096 BOOLEAN IsMercMercAvailable( UINT8 ubMercID )
02097 {
02098       UINT8 cnt;
02099 
02100       //loop through the array of mercs
02101       for( cnt=0; cnt<LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex; cnt++ )
02102       {
02103             //if this is the merc
02104             if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( cnt ) == ubMercID )
02105             {                 
02106                   //if the merc is available, and Not dead
02107 //                if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == 0 && !IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
02108                   if( IsMercHireable( ubMercID ) )
02109                         return( TRUE );
02110             }
02111       }
02112 
02113       return( FALSE );
02114 }
02115 
02116 BOOLEAN ShouldSpeckStartTalkingDueToActionOnSubPage()
02117 {
02118       //if the merc came from the hire screen
02119       if( gfJustHiredAMercMerc )
02120       {
02121 
02122             HandlePlayerHiringMerc( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) );
02123 
02124             //get speck to say the thank you 
02125             if( Random( 100 ) > 50 )
02126                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_GENERIC_THANKS_FOR_HIRING_MERCS_1 );
02127             else
02128                   StartSpeckTalking( SPECK_QUOTE_GENERIC_THANKS_FOR_HIRING_MERCS_2 );
02129 
02130             gfJustHiredAMercMerc = FALSE;
02131 //                      gfDoneIntroSpeech = TRUE;
02132 
02133             return( TRUE );
02134       }
02135 
02136 
02137 
02138       return( FALSE );
02139 }
