02142 
02143 BOOLEAN ShouldSpeckSayAQuote()
02144 {
02145       //if we are entering from anywhere except a sub page, and we should say the opening quote
02146       if( gfJustEnteredMercSite && gubArrivedFromMercSubSite == MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE )
02147       {
02148             //if the merc has something to say
02149             if( gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech != MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING )
02150                   return( FALSE );
02151       }
02152 
02153 
02154       //if the player just hired a merc
02155       if( gfJustHiredAMercMerc )
02156       {
02157             gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_HAS_TO_TALK_BUT_QUOTE_NOT_CHOSEN_YET;
02158             return( TRUE );
02159 
02160 /*
02161             //if the merc has something to say
02162             if( gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech != MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING )
02163                   return( TRUE );
02164             else
02165             {
02166                   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_HAS_TO_TALK_BUT_QUOTE_NOT_CHOSEN_YET;
02167                   return( TRUE );
02168             }
02169 */
02170       }
02171 
02172       //If it is the first time into the merc site
02173       if( gfFirstTimeIntoMERCSiteSinceEnteringLaptop )
02174       {
02175 //          gfFirstTimeIntoMERCSiteSinceEnteringLaptop = FALSE;
02176             gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_HAS_TO_TALK_BUT_QUOTE_NOT_CHOSEN_YET;
02177             return( TRUE );
02178       }
02179 
02180 /*
02181       //if we are entering from anywhere except a sub page
02182       if( gubArrivedFromMercSubSite == MERC_CAME_FROM_OTHER_PAGE )
02183       {
02184             GetSpeckConditionalOpening( FALSE );
02185             return( TRUE );
02186       }
02187 */
02188       return( FALSE );
02189 }
02190 
02191 void HandleSpeckIdleConversation( BOOLEAN fReset )
02192 {
02193       static UINT32     uiLastTime=0;
02194       UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
02195       INT16       sLeastSaidQuote;
02196 
02197       //if we should reset the variables
02198       if( fReset )
02199       {
02200             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
02201             return;
02202       }
02203 
02204 
02205 
02206       if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > SPECK_IDLE_CHAT_DELAY )
02207       {
02208 
02209             //if Speck is not talking
02210             if( !gfMercVideoIsBeingDisplayed )
02211             {
02212                   sLeastSaidQuote = GetRandomQuoteThatHasBeenSaidTheLeast( );
02213 
02214                   if( sLeastSaidQuote != -1 )
02215                         gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = (UINT8)sLeastSaidQuote;
02216 
02217                   //Say the aim slander quotes the least
02218                   if( sLeastSaidQuote >= 47 && sLeastSaidQuote <= 57 )
02219                   {
02220                         IncreaseMercRandomQuoteValue( (UINT8)sLeastSaidQuote, 1 );
02221                   }
02222                   else if( sLeastSaidQuote != -1 )
02223                         IncreaseMercRandomQuoteValue( (UINT8)sLeastSaidQuote, 3 );
02224             }
02225 
02226             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
02227       }
02228 }
02229 
02230 
02231 
02232 INT16 GetRandomQuoteThatHasBeenSaidTheLeast( )
02233 {
02234       UINT8 cnt;
02235       INT16 sSmallestNumber=255;
02236 
02237       for( cnt=0; cnt<MERC_NUMBER_OF_RANDOM_QUOTES; cnt++)
02238       {
02239             //if the quote can be said ( the merc has not been hired )
02240             if( CanMercQuoteBeSaid( gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[cnt].ubQuoteID ) )
02241             {
02242                   //if this quote has been said less times then the last one
02243                   if( gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[cnt].uiNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid < gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ sSmallestNumber ].uiNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid )
02244                   {
02245                         sSmallestNumber = cnt;
02246                   }
02247             }
02248       }
02249 
02250       if( sSmallestNumber == 255 )
02251             return( -1 );
02252       else
02253             return( gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ sSmallestNumber ].ubQuoteID );
02254 }
02255 
02256 void IncreaseMercRandomQuoteValue( UINT8 ubQuoteID, UINT8 ubValue )
02257 {
02258       UINT8 cnt;
02259 
02260       for( cnt=0; cnt<MERC_NUMBER_OF_RANDOM_QUOTES; cnt++)
02261       {
02262             if( gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ cnt ].ubQuoteID == ubQuoteID )
02263             {
02264                   if( gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ cnt ].uiNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid + ubValue > 255 )
02265                         gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ cnt ].uiNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid = 255;
02266                   else
02267                         gNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid[ cnt ].uiNumberOfTimesQuoteSaid += ubValue;
02268                   break;
02269             }
02270       }
02271 }
02272 
02273 
02274 void StopSpeckFromTalking( )
02275 {
02276       if( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex == -1 )
02277             return;
02278 
02279       //Stop speck from talking
02280       ShutupaYoFace( giVideoSpeckFaceIndex );
02281 
02282       RemoveSpeckPopupTextBox();
02283 
02284       gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = MERC_VIDEO_SPECK_SPEECH_NOT_TALKING;
02285 }
02286 
02287 BOOLEAN     HasLarryRelapsed()
02288 {
02289       return( CheckFact( FACT_LARRY_CHANGED, 0 ) );
02290 }

02296       gfFirstTimeIntoMERCSiteSinceEnteringLaptop = TRUE;
02297       gubCurMercIndex = 0;
02298 }

02300 
02301 
02302 BOOLEAN ShouldTheMercSiteServerGoDown()
02303 {
02304       UINT32      uiDay = GetWorldDay();
02305 
02306       // If the merc site has never gone down, the first new merc has shown ( which shows the player is using the site ), 
02307       // and the players account status is ok ( cant have the merc site going down when the player owes him money, player may lose account that way )
02308 //    if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fMercSiteHasGoneDownYet  && LaptopSaveInfo.gbNumDaysTillThirdMercArrives <= 6 && LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID )
02309       if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fMercSiteHasGoneDownYet  && LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId >= 1 && LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID )
02310       {
02311             if( Random( 100 ) < ( uiDay * 2 + 10 ) )
02312             {
02313                   return( TRUE );
02314             }
02315             else
02316             {
02317                   return( FALSE );
02318             }
02319       }
02320 
02321       return( FALSE );
02322 }

02325 void GetMercSiteBackOnline()
02326 {
02327       //Add an email telling the user the site is back up
02328       AddEmail( MERC_NEW_SITE_ADDRESS, MERC_NEW_SITE_ADDRESS_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin() );
02329 
02330       //Set a flag indicating that the server just went up ( so speck can make a comment when the player next visits the site )
02331       LaptopSaveInfo.fFirstVisitSinceServerWentDown = TRUE;
02332 }

02354 BOOLEAN CanMercQuoteBeSaid( UINT32 uiQuoteID )
02355 {
02356       BOOLEAN fRetVal = TRUE;
02357 
02358       //switch onb the quote being said, if hes plugging a merc that has already been hired, dont say it
02359       switch( uiQuoteID )
02360       {
02361             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_BIFF:
02362                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( BIFF ) )
02363                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02364                   break;
02365 
02366             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_HAYWIRE:
02367                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( HAYWIRE ) )
02368                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02369                   break;
02370 
02371             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_GASKET:
02372                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( GASKET ) )
02373                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02374                   break;
02375 
02376             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_RAZOR:
02377                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( RAZOR ) )
02378                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02379                   break;
02380 
02381             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_FLO:
02382                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( FLO ) )
02383                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02384                   break;
02385             
02386             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_GUMPY:
02387                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( GUMPY ) )
02388                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02389                   break;
02390 
02391             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_LARRY:
02392                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( LARRY_NORMAL ) || IsMercMercAvailable( LARRY_DRUNK ) )
02393                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02394                   break;
02395             
02396             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_COUGER:
02397                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( COUGAR ) )
02398                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02399                   break;
02400             
02401             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_NUMB:
02402                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( NUMB ) )
02403                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02404                   break;
02405             
02406             case SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_NOT_DOING_ANYTHING_SPECK_SELLS_BUBBA:
02407                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( BUBBA ) )
02408                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02409                   break;
02410             case SPECK_QUOTE_ADVERTISE_GASTON:
02411                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( GASTON ) )
02412                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02413                   break;
02414 
02415             case SPECK_QUOTE_ADVERTISE_STOGIE:
02416                   if( !IsMercMercAvailable( STOGIE ) )
02417                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02418                   break;
02419       }
02420 
02421 
02422       return( fRetVal );
02423 }

02443 BOOLEAN AreAnyOfTheNewMercsAvailable()
02444 {
02445       UINT8 i;
02446       UINT8 ubMercID;
02447 
02448 
02449       if( LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite )
02450             return( FALSE );
02451 
02452       for(i=(LARRY_NORMAL-BIFF); i<=LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex; i++)
02453       {
02454             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
02455 
02456             if( IsMercMercAvailable( ubMercID ) )
02457                   return( TRUE );
02458       }
02459 
02460       return( FALSE );
02461 }
02462 
02463 void ShouldAnyNewMercMercBecomeAvailable()
02464 {
02465       BOOLEAN fNewMercAreAvailable = FALSE;
02466 
02467       //Kaiden: Added this if test to make sure that the "New Mercs Available"
02468       // e-mail doesn't show up and no unneccessary checks are made when you
02469       // have the ALL_MERCS_AT_MERC set to TRUE in the INI file.
02470       if(!gGameExternalOptions.fAllMercsAvailable)
02471             {
02472                   //for bubba
02473                   //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == GUMPY )
02474                   {
02475                         if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_BUBBA ) )
02476                         {
02477                               fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02478                         }
02479                   }
02480 
02481                   //for Larry
02482                   //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == LARRY_NORMAL || 
02483                   //          GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == LARRY_DRUNK )
02484                   {
02485                         if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_LARRY ) )
02486                         {
02487                               fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02488                         }
02489                   }
02490 
02491                   //for Numb
02492                   //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == NUMB )
02493                   {
02494                         if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_NUMB ) )
02495                         {
02496                               fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02497                         }
02498                   }
02499 
02500                   if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_TEX ) )
02501                   {
02502                         fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02503                   }
02504 
02505                   if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_BIGGENS ) )
02506                   {
02507                         fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02508                   }
02509 
02510                   //for COUGAR
02511                   //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == COUGAR )
02512                   {
02513                         if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_COUGAR ) )
02514                         {
02515                               fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02516                         }
02517                   }
02518 
02519                   if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_GASTON ) )
02520                   {
02521                         fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02522                   }
02523 
02524                   if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_STOGIE ) )
02525                   {
02526                         fNewMercAreAvailable = TRUE;
02527                   }
02528 
02529                   //if there is a new merc available
02530                   if( fNewMercAreAvailable )
02531                   {
02532                         //Set up an event to add the merc in x days
02533                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_MERC_SITE_NEW_MERC_AVAILABLE, GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 ) + 420 + Random( 3 * 60 ), 0 );
02534                   }
02535             }
02536 }
02537 
02538 BOOLEAN CanMercBeAvailableYet( UINT8 ubMercToCheck )
02539 {
02540       //if the merc is already available
02541       if( gConditionsForMercAvailability[ ubMercToCheck ].ubMercArrayID <= LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex )
02542             return( FALSE );
02543 
02544       //if the merc is already hired
02545       if( !IsMercHireable( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gConditionsForMercAvailability[ ubMercToCheck ].ubMercArrayID ) ) )
02546             return( FALSE );
02547 
02548       //if player has paid enough money for the merc to be available, and the it is after the current day
02549       if( gConditionsForMercAvailability[ ubMercToCheck ].usMoneyPaid <= LaptopSaveInfo.uiTotalMoneyPaidToSpeck &&
02550                   gConditionsForMercAvailability[ ubMercToCheck ].usDay <= GetWorldDay() )
02551       {
02552             return( TRUE );
02553       }
02554 
02555       return( FALSE );
02556 }
02557 
02558 void NewMercsAvailableAtMercSiteCallBack( )
02559 {
02560       BOOLEAN fSendEmail=FALSE;
02561 //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == BUBBA )
02562       {
02563             if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_BUBBA ) )
02564             {
02565                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02566                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_BUBBA;
02567                   fSendEmail = TRUE;
02568             }
02569       }
02570 
02571       //for Larry
02572 //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == LARRY_NORMAL || 
02573 //                GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == LARRY_DRUNK )
02574       {
02575             if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_LARRY ) )
02576             {
02577                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02578                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_LARRY;
02579                   fSendEmail = TRUE;
02580             }
02581       }
02582 
02583       //for Numb
02584 //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == NUMB )
02585       {
02586             if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_NUMB ) )
02587             {
02588                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex = 9;
02589                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_NUMB;
02590                   fSendEmail = TRUE;
02591             }
02592       }
02593 
02594       if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_TEX ) )
02595       {
02596             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02597             LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_TEX;
02598             fSendEmail = TRUE;
02599       }
02600 
02601       if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_BIGGENS ) )
02602       {
02603             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02604             LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_BIGGENS;
02605             fSendEmail = TRUE;
02606       }
02607 
02608 //for COUGAR
02609 //    if( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex ) == COUGAR )
02610       {
02611             if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_COUGAR ) )
02612             {
02613                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02614                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_COUGAR;
02615                   fSendEmail = TRUE;
02616             }
02617       }
02618 
02619       if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_GASTON ) )
02620       {
02621             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02622             LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_GASTON;
02623             fSendEmail = TRUE;
02624       }
02625 
02626       if( CanMercBeAvailableYet( MERC_ARRIVES_STOGIE ) )
02627       {
02628             LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex++;
02629             LaptopSaveInfo.ubLastMercAvailableId = MERC_ARRIVES_STOGIE;
02630             fSendEmail = TRUE;
02631       }
02632 
02633       if( fSendEmail )
02634             AddEmail( NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC, NEW_MERCS_AT_MERC_LENGTH, SPECK_FROM_MERC, GetWorldTotalMin());
02635 
02636       //new mercs are available
02637       LaptopSaveInfo.fNewMercsAvailableAtMercSite = TRUE;
02638 }

02640 //used for older saves
02641 void CalcAproximateAmountPaidToSpeck()
02642 {
02643       UINT8 i, ubMercID;
02644 
02645       //loop through all the mercs and tally up the amount speck should have been paid
02646       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
02647       {
02648             //get the id
02649             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
02650 
02651             //increment the amount
02652             LaptopSaveInfo.uiTotalMoneyPaidToSpeck += gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].uiTotalCostToDate;
02653       }
02654 }
02655 
02656 // CJC Dec 1 2002: calculate whether any MERC characters have been used at all
02657 UINT32 CalcMercDaysServed()
02658 {
02659       UINT8 i, ubMercID;
02660       UINT32 uiDaysServed = 0;
02661 
02662       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
02663       {
02664             //get the id
02665             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
02666 
02667             uiDaysServed += gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].usTotalDaysServed;
02668 
02669       }
02670       return( uiDaysServed );
02671 }
